body: We'll address this in the Starlark version of aar_import in [rules_android](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android).
Since Bazel 7.1.0 is around the corner, I think we can actually get this into the upcoming release.
Would be great if this was CP'd onto the release! Thanks for the timely fix :)

issue.title: [7.1.0] Android Platforms does not work with AAR Import

issue.title: [7.1.0] Enable aar_import JNI libs to work with --android_platforms.

body:
A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 7.1.0 RC2](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.1.0rc2). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting USE_BAZEL_VERSION=7.1.0rc2. Thanks!
